.btn: border: 1px solid var(--border-soft); background: #fff; color: var(--text-main); padding: 10px 16px; border-radius: var(--radius-m); font-size: 13px; cursor: pointer; transition: background var(--transition-fast) var(--ease-soft), border-color var(--transition-fast) var(--ease-soft)
.topbar: position: sticky; top: 0; z-index: 10; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: space-between; padding: 12px 0; background: #f8f8f8; border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-subtle)
.ui-section: background: #fff; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 10px
